name: Snapshot Isle
description:
Channel your inner photographer to capture 
the natural beauty of a remote island
and complete commissions for 
peculiar clients!

A downloadable game demo for Windows

Created by Dinky Dinos:
Aushton, David, Dean, Drew,
Eyan, Phill, Rowan, Vanessa

With help from:
